tools.title: GDC QAG
tools.description: Get specific answers to complex, multi-step, free-text genomics questions using factually grounded information retrieved from the GDC.

tools.title: Cohort Copilot
tools.description: Construct GDC cohorts using natural language queries describing the cases you're looking for. The resulting cohorts can be used with standard GDC utilities and APIs.

tools.title: Data Model Generator
tools.description: AI tool to assist with data curation and harmonization. This model is a fined-tuned LoRA layer based on Llama-3.1-8B that is optimized for the specific task of generating structured data models in JSON format from a dump of tabular data files.
